content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > you are very welcome to join the sweet > bee crochet facebook community share photos of your current projects connect with other crocheters and find new project inspiration click > here to join 1 this festive vintage inspired ornament is the perfect holiday stash buster project a quick make that is great for hanging on the tree adding to gift bags or wrapping up to surprise someone special these ornaments also look amazing in bright colours pastel shades or bold colourways hang them around your deck or sitting space in the spring and summer for some fun outdoor decor there are so many ways to personalize these ornaments with colours for various occasions **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 13-14 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn total in 3 colours i used bernat handicrafter yardage does not include yarn for tassel - 4mm hook - bead or decorative jewel appropriate for the yarn mine was 10mm - yarn needle - scissors ***this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products *** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
